skills.description: Shoot a bolt of electricity that deals 3 damage.
skills.name: Blitz Bolt
statDescriptions: Stunned makes target unable to move or act.
Can target some surfaces and clouds to electrify them.

skills.description: Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 5 times in a 7 radius and deals 4 damage to each target.
skills.name: Chain Lightning
statDescriptions: Stunned makes target unable to move or act.
Can target some surfaces and clouds to electrify them.

skills.description: Set Invisible status on a target.
skills.name: Make Invisible
statDescriptions: When you are invisible, enemies cannot see you or target you directly.
Invisibility breaks when casting or attacking, or when detected.

skills.description: Cures the petrification status, the slowed status and the stunned status.
skills.name: Wind Of Change

skills.description: Freeze a target.
skills.name: Bitter Cold
statDescriptions: Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.

skills.description: A magical claw hold. Deals 5 damage.
skills.name: Headvice
statDescriptions: Blinded characters cannot target others unless they're standing right next to them.

skills.description: Make a target immune to being Electrified and Stunned.
skills.name: Avatar Of Storms

skills.description: Electrify a target at an arm's distance. Deals 1 damage.
skills.name: Shocking Touch
statDescriptions: Stunned makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Jump from one target to the other, hitting maximum 2 targets, stunning them and dealing 2 damage.
skills.name: Thunder Jump
statDescriptions: Stunned makes target unable to move or act.
Caster will be moved behind last target.

skills.description: Create a lightning storm that randomly picks 8 to 10 targets and deals 3 damage.
skills.name: Storm
statDescriptions: Stunned makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Removes surfaces from the battlefield, reveals invisible characters and clears Warm, Burning and Hastened.
skills.name: Tornado

skills.description: Throw an item or character up high and drop it to the ground, dealing 4 damage.
skills.name: Teleportation
statDescriptions: Target can be moved 15 away from its position.
Select item or character first, then select its destination.

skills.description: Make two characters switch places.
skills.name: Netherswap
statDescriptions: Select two characters of equal size. One of the characters can be you.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 air elemental in a 15 radius for 3
skills.name: Summon Air Elemental
statDescriptions: Air elementals can cast a forking lightning bolt spell and a featherdrop teleportation spell. Their normal attack deals air damage and has a chance of stunning the target.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Enchant self or ally with an air shield. An air shield absorbs air damage until it breaks.
skills.name: Air Absorption Shield

skills.description: Become invisible for a short while.
skills.name: Invisibility

skills.description: [Make a corpse or a container explode. The flying debris will damage characters around it.]
skills.name: Shrapnel Scatter

skills.description: Fire an arrow that splinters on impact, dividing 250% (Piercing) damage over all targets in a 8 radius.
skills.name: Splintered Arrow
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Fire 16 arrows in a 45 degree arc. Each arrow deals 50% (Piercing) damage.
skills.name: Arrow Spray
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Fire a normal arrow that deals 100% (Piercing) damage and then forks off to the next target up to 4 times within 8.
skills.name: Ricochet
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Fire multiple arrows in a straight line, each dealing 75% (Piercing) damage.
skills.name: Barrage
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: An arrow that deals half of your weapon damage, 50% (Piercing), that fully heals you over two rounds.
skills.name: Vampiric Arrow
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Grant a target improved sight and +50 chance to hit with ranged weapons for 4 turns. Removes Blinded.
skills.name: Farseer
statDescriptions: A higher Sight score improves your chance to hit with ranged weapons over longer distances.

skills.description: Decrease armour, but grant higher resistances against all the elements.
skills.name: Absorb The Elements

skills.description: Cures bleeding, crippled and diseased. Heals target for 10%.
skills.name: First Aid

skills.description: Cures weak, blind, mute and infectious disease. Grants Bodybuilding for 2 turns.
skills.name: Doctor

skills.description: Cures poison.
skills.name: Treat Poisoning
statDescriptions: Target gains 100% poison resistance for 2 turns.

skills.description: Plant an infectious disease on a nearby target.
skills.name: Infect
statDescriptions: Disease lowers target's constitution by -3 and Bodybuilding ability by -2
Infectious disease has a chance of infecting everyone that comes near the target.

skills.description: Let a shower of piercing arrows rain down on your enemy. Deals 300% (Piercing) damage to each enemy.
skills.name: Rain Of Arrows
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Increase luck and critical chance of you and all around you.
skills.name: Survivor's Karma
statDescriptions: Luck increases your chance to hit, and improves the odds of finding valuables.

skills.description: Improve damage with bow and crossbow at the cost of precision. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Ranged Power Stance
statDescriptions: Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance. Decreases chance to hit. Attacks cost extra action points.

skills.description: Improve chance to hit with bow and crossbow at the cost of movement speed. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Ranged Precision Stance
statDescriptions: Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance. Decreases damage. Attacks cost extra action points.

skills.description: Cast a magical poisonous dart that does 6 damage.
skills.name: Magical Poison Dart
statDescriptions: Poisoned deals poison damage over time.
Can target terrain to create ooze surface.

skills.description: Launch multiple poisonous spores that each deal 5 damage each to anything 3 from impact.
skills.name: Deadly Spores
statDescriptions: Poisoned deals poison damage over time.
Can target terrain to create ooze surface.

skills.description: A boulder comes crashing from the sky, dealing 4 damage to anything within a 1 range from impact, creating an oil surface where it lands.
skills.name: Boulder Bash

skills.description: Give yourself or another target magical armor.
skills.name: Fortify

skills.description: Bless a target. Removes curse.
skills.name: Bless
statDescriptions: Blessed boosts Chance to hit by +30 for 2 turns.

skills.description: Create an oil surface.
skills.name: Midnight Oil
statDescriptions: Oil slows characters down and can be set on fire.

skills.description: Make a target immune to being Poisoned.
skills.name: Avatar Of Poison
statDescriptions: Target can still take Poison damage.

skills.description: Turn a nearby target to stone, dealing 1 damage.
skills.name: Petrifying Touch
statDescriptions: Petrified makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Deal 7 damage to all targets in a 45 degree cone that's 7 long. Creates an oil surface. Has a chance to petrify.
skills.name: Tectonic Spray
statDescriptions: Petrified makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Knocks down characters, deals 9 damage, and creates random oil surfaces.
skills.name: Earthquake
statDescriptions: Knockdown makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 earth elemental in a 15 radius for 3
skills.name: Summon Earth Elemental
statDescriptions: Earth elementals can cast  a deadly spores spell and a double boulder bash. They deal earth damage and can cripple their targets.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 wolf within a 5 radius for 4
skills.name: Summon Wolf
statDescriptions: The wolf is immune to Freezing, cannot be Chilled and takes no damage from Water attacks. It does, however, take extra damage from Fire attacks. Its ferocious bite attack has a 20% chance to set Bleeding status for 2 turns. It has a special Throat Bite skill. Has Attack of Opportunity.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 ooze in a 15 radius for 5
skills.name: Summon Poison Slug
statDescriptions: This creature is slow and may not seem good at anything, but it can sure take a lot of punishment! Its normal attack has a 20% chance of slowing down its target.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 spider in a 10 radius for 5
skills.name: Summon Spider
statDescriptions: The spider's fangs deal piercing damage and have a 10% chance to Poison its target. It is very resistant to poison attacks itself. The spider has a special attack that can weaken its victim. It is immune to Blinding attacks.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Enchant self or ally with an earth shield. An earth shield absorbs earth damage until it breaks.
skills.name: Earth Absorption Shield

skills.description: Bless allies around you.
skills.name: Blessed Earth
statDescriptions: Blessed improves chance to hit by 30

skills.description: Shoot a chilling shard of ice that deals 6 damage.
skills.name: Ice Shard
statDescriptions: Chilled makes target less resistant to water spells, but a bit more resistant to fire spells. Chilled has a negative impact on movement. Chilled targets that get chilled again, turn frozen.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

skills.description: 20 ice shards rain from the sky, each doing 1 damage to enemies within 15 range from impact.
skills.name: Hail Attack
statDescriptions: Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.
Can target terrain to create ice surface or freeze water.

skills.description: Heal all within an area for 7 turns.
skills.name: Mass Heal

skills.description: Cures blind, mute, disease, infectuous disease, bleeding, crippled.
skills.name: Cleansing Water

skills.description: Disease all enemies within an area.
skills.name: Mass Disease
statDescriptions: Disease lowers target's constitution by -3 and Bodybuilding ability by -2.

skills.description: Slow a target.
skills.name: Slow Current
statDescriptions: Slowed characters move more slowly and receive less AP.

skills.description: Make a target immune to being Frozen.
skills.name: Avatar Of Frost
statDescriptions: Target can still become chilled and still takes Water damage.

skills.description: Freeze a nearby target, dealing 1 damage.
skills.name: Freezing Touch
statDescriptions: Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.

skills.description: Freeze and deal 5 damage to all targets in a 60 degree cone that's 9 long.
skills.name: Winterblast
statDescriptions: Frozen makes target unable to move or act, but target gains armor and fire resistance.

skills.description: Create a wall to block off enemies or to lock them inside. Deals 3 damage.
skills.name: Ice Wall
statDescriptions: Draw a line where you want the wall to appear.

skills.description: Create water surfaces.
skills.name: Rain
statDescriptions: Creates water puddles on terrain, douses fires, and makes characters wet. Wet makes target less resistant to air spells but more resistant to fire spells.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 ice elemental in a 15 radius for 3
skills.name: Summon Ice Elemental
statDescriptions: Ice elementals can cast a piercing ice blast spell. Their normal attack does water damage and can chill the target.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Heal 4 vitality on a target for 3 turns.
skills.name: Regeneration

skills.description: Enchant self or ally with a water shield. A water shield absorbs water damage until it breaks.
skills.name: Water Absorption Shield

skills.description: You and allies around you magically gain Constitution and heal immensely.
skills.name: Water Of Life

skills.description: Slow enemies around you.
skills.name: Mass Slow
statDescriptions: Slowed characters move more slowly and receive less AP.

skills.description: Mark a target that will receive all of the damage you receive.
skills.name: Shackles Of Pain

skills.description: Help a knocked down friend back up, or pat out a fire on a friend.
skills.name: Helping Hand

skills.description: Attack with a flurry of your weapon and deal 70% (Slashing) damage.
skills.name: Flurry
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: An enormous fist smashes your enemy and knocks him down. Deals 1 damage.
skills.name: Crushing Fist
statDescriptions: Knockdown makes target unable to move or act.

skills.description: Cripple a target. Deals 130% (Crushing) weapon damage.
skills.name: Crippling Blow
statDescriptions: Crippled status has a negative impact on target's movement and Action Point recovery.

skills.description: Decreases Willpower and Bodybuilding.
skills.name: Divine Light
statDescriptions: Lower Bodybuilding and Willpower scores, means more chance to set statuses on targets: their saving throws chances are slim.

skills.description: Rush forward in a straight line, to a point far away, hitting all enemies in your path with X-Y damage.
skills.name: Battering Ram
statDescriptions: Knockdown makes target unable to move or act.
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Immediately heal a nearby target for 7 vitality.
skills.name: Cure Wounds

skills.description: Taunt all enemies within 8 around you.. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.
skills.name: Taunt

skills.description: Encourage allies around you.
skills.name: Encourage
statDescriptions: Encouraged boosts target's Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Constitution stats by 1.

skills.description: Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for X-Y damage.
skills.name: Whirlwind
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Enter an enraged state.
skills.name: Rage
statDescriptions: Rage drops your armour rating and chance to hit, but you do more damage and have higher crit chance:

skills.description: Improve damage of melee attacks and movement speed at the cost of precision. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Melee Power Stance
statDescriptions: Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance. Decreases chance to hit.

skills.description: Improve defense at the cost of damage. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Melee Defensive Stance
statDescriptions: Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance.

skills.description: Improve elemental resistances, but movement is slowed. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Elemental Tortoise
statDescriptions: Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance.  Requires a shield.

skills.description: Reflect melee damage inflicted to you, but less chance to hit. (Toggle Stance)
skills.name: Barbed Wire
statDescriptions: Enemies attacking you with melee weapons will take half the damage they deal to you as piercing damage.
You may start bleeding as you activate this stance.
Lasts until cancelled or replaced by another stance. Requires a shield.

skills.description: Cast magical heat that does 3 damage.
skills.name: Flare
statDescriptions: Warm makes target a bit less resistant to fire spells but more resistant to water spells.
Can burn targets that are already warm. Can target terrain to create fire surface, burn ooze or oil, evaporate water, or melt ice. Can explode some clouds.

skills.description: Cast a magical flame that forks on impact and does 5 damage to each target.
skills.name: Infectious Flame
statDescriptions: Forks up to 5 times looking for next target in a 7 radius
Burning does fire damage over time.
Can target terrain to create fire surface, burn ooze, evaporate water, or melt ice.

skills.description: Cast an explosive ball of fire that does 6 damage to anything within 3.5 from impact.
skills.name: Fireball
statDescriptions: Burning does fire damage over time.
Can target terrain to create fire surface, burn ooze or oil, evaporate water, or melt ice. Can explode some clouds.

skills.description: 30 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does 1 damage to enemies within a 3.5 range from impact.
skills.name: Meteor Shower
statDescriptions: Burning does fire damage over time.
Can target terrain to create fire surface, burn ooze or oil, evaporate water, or melt ice. Can explode some clouds.

skills.description: Removes burning, frozen, stun, charm, petrified, healing and shields.
skills.name: Purifying Fire

skills.description: Haste a target.
skills.name: Wildfire
statDescriptions: Hastened boosts the target's maximum AP by 3, starting AP by 3 and recovery AP by 2. Hastened also improves movement speed.

skills.description: Target gains a temporary perception bonus. Cures Blinded.
skills.name: Burn My Eyes

skills.description: Instantly set a target on fire. Deals 4 damage.
skills.name: Immolation
statDescriptions: Burning does fire damage over time.

skills.description: Make a target immune to Burning.
skills.name: Avatar Of Fire
statDescriptions: Target can still become warm and still takes Fire damage.

skills.description: Set fire to a nearby target, dealing 3 damage.
skills.name: Burning Touch
statDescriptions: Burning does fire damage over time.

skills.description: Create a fire surface.
skills.name: Firefly
statDescriptions: Fire surfaces can inflict burning and deal fire damage.
Draw your own fire surface in a line. Line starts at your position. Click on the terrain to create a line until you have reached the line's maximum length.

skills.description: Create a smoke cloud.
skills.name: Smokescreen
statDescriptions: Smoke clouds limit every character's vision.
Draw your own smokescreen in a line. Line starts at your position. Click on the terrain to create a line until you have reached the line's maximum length.

skills.description: Summon a level -1 fire elemental in a 15 radius for 3
skills.name: Summon Fire Elemental
statDescriptions: Fire Elementals can cast a 3-projectile blaze spell. Their normal attack is pure fire that can warm up the target.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Enchant self or ally with a fire shield. A fire shield absorbs fire damage until it breaks.
skills.name: Fire Absorption Shield

skills.description: Deals 6 damage to yourself and those within 6 around you.
skills.name: Explode

skills.description: Create a fire surface around you, with you in the middle. Grants everyone around you 25% fire resistance for 2 turns and removes Frozen and Stunned.
skills.name: Self Immolation

skills.description: Deal the killing blow to a target that's below 20% vitality.
skills.name: Coup De Grace

skills.description: Plant a monstruous egg in an enemy close by.
skills.name: Crawling Infestation
statDescriptions: Unless the target resists or succeeds a saving throw, its mortal shell will give way to a monster as it comes out after 3 turns.

skills.description: Poison your target. Deals 100% (Piercing) damage.
skills.name: Venomous Strike
statDescriptions: Poisoned deals poison damage over time.
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Step through the shadows and attack a target from behind, dealing 100% (Piercing) weapon damage. Then go back to where you came from.
skills.name: Shadow Step
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Erupt with a barrage of stabs and cuts and deal 70% (Piercing) damage.
skills.name: Daggers Drawn
statDescriptions: Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Knock down a target. Deals 1 damage.
skills.name: Trip

skills.description: Weaken a target. Deals 150% (Slashing) damage.
skills.name: Precise Incision
statDescriptions: Weak lowers target's damage by -50 and strength by -2

skills.description: Blind a target. Does 100% (Piercing) damage.
skills.name: Eye Gouge

skills.description: Inflict bleeding. Does 150% (Slashing) damage.
skills.name: Lacerate
statDescriptions: Bleeding deals physical damage over time.
Damage dealt depends on your weapon's damage rating.

skills.description: Teleport, leaving behind a smokescreen.
skills.name: Cloak And Dagger

skills.description: Summon a level -1 bomb in a 3 radius for 5
skills.name: Wind-Up Toy
statDescriptions: Press the button to go BOOM.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Makes yourself immune to surfaces, as if you were floating.
skills.name: Hoverfeet

skills.description: Become hastened for a short while.
skills.name: Fast Track
statDescriptions: Hastened boosts the target's maximum AP by 3, starting AP by 3 and recovery AP by 2. Hasted also improves movement speed.

skills.description: Only take half of all physical damage dealt to you.
skills.name: Become Air

skills.description: Become one with the shadows.
skills.name: Walk In Shadows

skills.description: Borrow Action Points from your next turn.
skills.name: Adrenaline

skills.description: Silence a target.
skills.name: Mute
statDescriptions: Mute status prevents a character from using any spells or scrolls.

skills.description: Charm a target.
skills.name: Rapture
statDescriptions: Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around.

skills.description: Make a target decay so that it cannot be healed by magic or potions anymore.
skills.name: Decaying Touch
statDescriptions: Decay makes healing spells and potions do damage on target.

skills.description: Decrease a target's Willpower by -5
skills.name: Drain Willpower
statDescriptions: Decreased Willpower makes enemies more susceptible to mind attacks.

skills.description: Lower all of the target's powers and abilities.
skills.name: Soulsap
statDescriptions: The target's primary attributes are decreased by 2, their Bodybuilding and Willpower abilities are decreased by 5, and all their elemental and physical resistances are decreased by 50%.

skills.description: Heal yourself with the life force of someone else. Damages them for 3.
skills.name: Vampiric Touch

skills.description: Deal 10 damage to a target near you.
skills.name: Death Punch

skills.description: Bestow a damage boost upon an ally
skills.name: Oath Of Desecration

skills.description: Malediction weakens and curses an enemy.
skills.name: Malediction
statDescriptions: Cursed lowers a target's chance to hit by -30
Weak lowers a target's damage by 50%

skills.description: Deal immense damage to a summoned creature.
skills.name: Destroy Summon

skills.description: Resurrect a dead ally to 50% of its vitality at a location within 10.
skills.name: Resurrect

skills.description: Resurrect a dead ally to 20% of its vitality at a location within 10.
skills.name: Resuscitate

skills.description: Summon a level -1 skeleton in a 10 radius for 4
skills.name: Summon Undead Warrior
statDescriptions: The soldier's weak leather armour is worn and his axe is dull, but like all skeletons, he is immune to bleeding attacks, he cannot be poisoned and piercing weapons only do 75% damage. Has very low saving throws against physical and mental statuses. Has a special attack that can inflict bleeding.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Summon a powerful level -1 skeletal knight in a 12 radius for 5
skills.name: Summon Armoured Undead Decapitator
statDescriptions: The knight's two hander has a 20% chance to knock down its target and has a chance to crit. Most of his plate armour is rusty, yet intact, and arrows and daggers only do half damage. Like all skeletons, he is immune to bleeding attacks, and he cannot be poisoned.  Has medium saving throws against physical and mental statuses. Can taunt enemies. Has the Attack Of Opportunity ability.
You can only have one summon at a time.

skills.description: Make yourself invulnerable.
skills.name: Invulnerability

skills.description: Decreases all elemental resistances of enemies around you.
skills.name: Lower Resistances
statDescriptions: Fire, Earth, Air and Water resistances get a 20% penalty.

skills.description: Make enemies around you cower and flee.
skills.name: Horrific Scream
